Articles.Content: OK, so I guess the title gave it away, hmm? I'm going to start making KSP memes, leave you suggestions below!

You could do the above meme with this picture and it would still work:

"Only in KSP will you launch rockets to Mun for the sole purpose of looking at a rock...

for HOURS."
Please, please, Please, no more memes. You know how overdone they are.

Please, please, Please, no more memes. You know how overdone they are.

I like memes.

Please, please, Please, no more memes. You know how overdone they are.

but...but http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39767-KSP-Memes
Please stop. Memes are not art work and are overdone.
Agreed. I found Memes funny 3 years ago, but 90% of them have zero shelf life, are overused, and the general format stopped being amusing the second the masses found them.
Most caption memes still have life in them....
Here plenty of artwork on the subject: http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/jebediah-kerman/photos
I'd say pasting some text on a screenshot with paint isn't really considered "artwork".

Don't let the haters keep you down. (Good) Memes are great.

If you hate memes, try this: Don't read a thread with the word "memes" in the subject.

Edited July 18, 2013 by 5thHorseman

Don't let the haters keep you down. (Good) Memes are great.

If you hate memes, try this: Don't read a thread with the word "memes" in the subject.

This.

Now to go watch an old '30s movie called "The Tenchar of Doom."

To be a meme, the image needs to be in wide circulation, most so-called meme's are one-off images with no real meaning or recognition by the wider internet community.

In other words, a pic with some text just doesn't cut it, it has to spread and be widely known for it to really be a meme.

Also meme's are horrible little things, moving to a more suitable forum......

Also meme's are horrible little things

I beg to differ, but I'm loathe to argue with a mod....
Why do you guys hate memes so much. ;(

To be a meme, the image needs to be in wide circulation, most so-called meme's are one-off images with no real meaning or recognition by the wider internet community.

In other words, a pic with some text just doesn't cut it, it has to spread and be widely known for it to really be a meme.

Also meme's are horrible little things, moving to a more suitable forum......

Horrible things? What have done to you? Almost every thread gets reply with a meme in it.
